overview: This time Commander Lara places himself on the thin line between good and evil, with blunt force his past will return to put him the toughest of tests. His duty and his family ties place him in MORTAL DANGER when he finds that one of the most dangerous criminals is pursuing his own blood. A stunning, breathtaking movie, with the biggest movie stars of Mexican cinema. The best and most explosive action movie production.
title: Mortal Danger
